info.title: Mitheithel Open API
info.description:
Mitheithel Open API allows for effortless research on any topic.

## Research

The research features are divided into two modes: speed and quality.

### Speed vs Quality

| Mode      | Time      | Output | Use Case |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- |
| Speed | Around 12 seconds | Final response + References + Keywords | Day-to-day questions and real-time applications. |
| Quality | Around 1.5 minutes | Final response + References + Keywords + Up to 5 Complete Sub-Queries Answered | Complex questions, in-depth research, and non-real-time applications (e.g., news). |

## Finance-Specific Endpoints

Mitheithel Open API was born from GPTStonks, so we include the most relevant finance-related endpoints used in GPTStonks. They take only a few seconds to respond, as the answers are cached.

get.description:
Asynchronous endpoint for fast intelligent web surfing.

Args:

- query (`str`): user query to research and answer.

- timelimit (`str`): how old are the posts retrieved from the Internet. One of d, w, m, y. Defaults to one week old.

Explain financial concepts to users.

The concept is updated every day. The concept is retrieved in the language of your account, but
it is faster in English (i.e., without any token).

Provide a detailed explanation of the most relevant news of the day.

Updated twice per day. The concept is retrieved in the language of your account, but it is
faster in English (i.e., without any token).

Return all the titles of the news of the past 7 days, with their UUIDs.

Max. 100 news.

schema.title: Response Recover Open News Ids Recommend Open Titles All Get

post.description:
Recommend TradingView widgets based on the given query.

Args:

- query_in (`str`): text to retrieve the widgets with. E.g., news about Google will retrieve news widgets and possibly some related to Google stock price.

BaseAgentResponse.title: BaseAgentResponse
BaseAgentResponse.description: Model to define the base response parameters.

content_presented.title: Content Presented
content_presented.description: content sent to the final user

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: when the content presented was ingested into Mongo

unique_id.title: Unique Id
unique_id.description: unique identifier for the conversation, if any

ContentPresentedOut.title: ContentPresentedOut
ContentPresentedOut.description: Model to send an educational concept.

unique_id.title: Unique Id
unique_id.description: unique identifier for the conversation, if any

EnumerationContentPresentedOut.title: EnumerationContentPresentedOut
EnumerationContentPresentedOut.description: Model to return titles and their UUIDs to be retrieved later.

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: the symbol of the company's ticker (NVDA, AAPL, GME, etc.).

FundamentalAnalysisTVWidget.title: FundamentalAnalysisTVWidget
FundamentalAnalysisTVWidget.description: Deep dive into how a company is doing beyond simply its stock price.

market.title: Market
market.description: country to load in lowercase (america, canada, china, germany, italy, taiwan...), 'forex' or 'crypto'. Use america by default.

ScreenerTVWidget.title: ScreenerTVWidget
ScreenerTVWidget.description: Handy for sorting symbols both by fundamental and technical indicators.

exchange.title: Exchange
exchange.description: symbol of the exchange to load: NASDAQ, NYSE, OTC, AMEX, BER, DUS... Use NASDAQ by default.

StockMarketTVWidget.title: StockMarketTVWidget
StockMarketTVWidget.description: See the top five gaining, losing, and most active stocks for the day.

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: the symbol of the security (BTCUSD, NVDA, AAPL, GME, etc.)

TechnicalAnalysisTVWidget.title: TechnicalAnalysisTVWidget
TechnicalAnalysisTVWidget.description: See what the technical analysis says about a given symbol.

market.title: Market
market.description: None if feed is not 'market'. Otherwise, one of 'crypto', 'forex', 'stock', 'index', 'futures' or 'cfd'.

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: None if feed is not 'symbol'. Otherwise, the symbol of the security (BTCUSD, NVDA, AAPL, etc.).

TopStoriesTVWidget.title: TopStoriesTVWidget
TopStoriesTVWidget.description: Daily brief news designed to be read in 20 seconds or less.
